name: Classic Word Cloud Save File
summary: A WCLD file stores information about a word cloud created by classic.wordclouds.com, a web tool for customizing word clouds. It contains all of the information about the word cloud, including a list of words, font, shape, and theme colors. When a user saves a word cloud with classic.wordclouds.com, the website automatically downloads a WCLD file to your desktop to store the information; users can upload the WCLD file to the site to open the word cloud and continue editing it.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
